channel.title: WatCamp Events
channel.description: Taking inspiration from the TorCamp calendar. This calendar lists all tech events taking place in the KW area.

item.title: Waterloo-Wellington Clinical Research and Quality Improvement Symposium
item.description:
Date and Time: Wednesday, May 31 2017

Location: McMaster Waterloo Regional Campus, 10-B Victoria St S, Kitchener, ON

https://uwaterloo.ca/engineering/events/waterloo-wellington-clinical-research-and-quality Waterloo-Wellington Clinical Research and Quality Improvement Symposiumï¿¼

Wednesday, May 31, 2017 (all day)

McMaster Waterloo Regional Campus 10-B Victoria Street South Kitchener, ON

This symposium is devoted to research and quality improvement in the Waterloo-Wellington region. It brings together local students, clinicians, professionals, and researchers who are working to improve the clinical care in our region.

This annual event allows local clinical trainees, non-clinical trainees, clinicians, professionals, and researchers to showcase their research and quality improvement work and receive recognition for their clinical and scientific excellence.

The goal of the symposium is to provide an outstanding opportunity for trainees to develop professional skills and to foster communication and exchange of ideas among new and established clinicians, professionals, and researchers from various backgrounds and interests.

Call for Abstracts open until April 28. Registration open until May 17.

Location McMaster Waterloo Regional Campus 10-B Victoria Street South Kitchener, ON N2G 1C5 Canada
